What does “TIL” mean, and how do you use it? - Quora

results.p: Aug 8, 2024 — a distinct word that existed in English at least a century before until, both as a preposition meaning “to” and as a conjunction meaning “until.”

results.t: TIL | definition in the Cambridge English Dictionary
results.p: abbreviation for today I learned: used in writing, for example on social media, before giving interesting new information: TIL "Hey Jude" and "Bohemian ...
Oct 3, 2022 — Until indicates when something will happen, begin, or end. Till means the same thing as until. Till is not an abbreviation of until—it's ...

results.t: The Wait Is Over! Learn If You Should Use “'Til” or “Till”
results.p: Mar 8, 2022 — Until, till, and 'til all mean the same thing. The informal contraction 'til is a shortening of until that's typically only used in informal contexts.

results.t: TIL definition and meaning | Collins English Dictionary
results.p: 2 meanings: another name for sesame, esp a variety grown in India informal → a variant form of till1 (sense 1).... Click for more definitions.
'Til = shortened form of until used by people who don't realise that "till" is perfectly correct and acceptable. Til = does not exist.

results.t: til conjunction - Definition, pictures, pronunciation and ...
results.p: (informal) ​until. We're open til 6 o'clock. Can't you wait til we get home? Just wait til you see it; it's great.

results.t: TILL | definition in the Cambridge English Dictionary
results.p: up to (the time that); until: We waited till six thirty for you. Up till 1919, women in the US were not allowed to vote. How long is it till the baby is due?

results.t: Til vs. Till vs. Until (Grammar Rules)
results.p: Dec 20, 2021 — 'Til is an abbreviation of until that is actually incorrect. It's often used by poets, songwriters, and people who absorb both.
